metadata.description: Part man and part monster, Two-Face has been one of Batman's greatest and most fearsome villains for more than 75 years! He's an essential part of the Dark Knight's rogues gallery, but unlike the Joker, Scarecrow or Bane, Two-Face alone has some good left inside his soul fighting his evil persona—half the time, anyway. Chaos or order. Life or death. Tragic fallen attorney or scar-faced fiend. It all depends on how the coin falls...
metadata.name: Two-Face: A Celebration of 75 Years
